_sText:
ka_chillpillarena

Theme:

This is a simple knife map featuring a showdown of Counter-Terrorists and Terriorists at "The Tree of Knife". The objective of both team is to eliminate the other team.

Map made during my days with the ChillPill-Club. See in-game signature plate for credits.

---------------------------------

This is the third map I've created.

Installation instructions:

To install, place contents of this .rar into your "counter-strike source\cstrike\maps" folder. Everything's packed into the .bsp.

Enjoy! =)

---------------------------------

MAY 2011, ASTFA` (aka CenTor!oR`)
